title: Nintendo DS returning to Game & Watch roots
html: Hmm. Looks like some pictures of the new Nintendo DS are filtering out of E3 today. Notice any similarities?
body:
Hmm.  Looks like some pictures of the new Nintendo DS are [filtering out of E3][usatoday] today.  [Notice any similarities][dk]?

[![Nintendo's new GB DS][dsimg]][usatoday]
[![Nintendo's old Donkey Kong Game & Watch][dkimg]][dk]
